mapper.select: select * from TB_CONF_COST_COMPANY t, Tb_Conf_Cost_Item i left join TB_CONF_COST_ITEM_ALIAS a on i.idx = a.item_id where t.cost_code = i.cost_code and t.COMPANY_ID = #{companyId} order by t.sort
select * from Tb_Conf_Cost_Item t left join TB_CONF_COST_ITEM_ALIAS a on t.idx = a.item_id
select * from tb_conf_cost_item t where 1=1 and t.idx = #{idx}

select b.id as id, a.id as GRID_INFO_ID, a.describe as grid_desc, b.v_code as item_VCode, b.name as item_Name, d.alias_name as alias_name, b.d_code as item_DCode, b.DATATYPE as DATATYPE from tb_conf_grid_info a, tb_conf_grid_items b, tb_conf_grid_item_company c left join TB_CONF_GRID_ITEM_ALIAS d on c.item_id = d.item_id and d.company_id = #{companyId} where a.id = b.grid_id and b.id = c.item_id and c.company_id = #{companyId} and a.id = #{gridInfoId} order by c.sort
mapper.delete: delete from TB_CONF_GRID_ITEM_ALIAS where item_id = #{itemId} and company_id = #{companyId}
delete from TB_CONF_COST_ITEM_ALIAS where item_id = #{itemId} and company_id = #{companyId}
delete tb_conf_grid_item_company a where a.COMPANY_ID = #{companyId} and exists (select 1 from tb_conf_grid_items b where a.item_id = b.id and b.grid_id =#{gridInfoId} )
